features: At The Heart Of Every Playtime: This 13 Inch Soft Baby Doll Will Become Your Child’S Favorite Playtime Partner. With Brown Eyes And Fair Skin Tone, It Even Smells Just Like A Real Baby, With Fresh Baby Powder Scent! Ages 1+
Banish Germs From Your Playdate: All Adora Playtime Dolls Are 100% Machine Washable, Safety Tested & Bpa Free, So Parents Will Love Them Too!
Encourages Nurturing And Pretend Play - Created In Our Exclusive Gentletouch Vinyl, And Made For Play, You’Ll Be Inspiring Your Child In Imaginative Play, Teaching Kindness And Empathy.

She Can Suck Her Thumb And Her Eyes Open And Close! Featuring Fun Baby Doll Accessories, Including A Toy Baby Bottle For Feeding Time And Removable On-Trend Outfit, Making This Baby Doll A Perfect Play Time Or Nap Time Friend!
PlayTime Baby Dot’s bean weighted bottom giving her a real baby feel. She arrives dressed in a cute polka-dot sleeper with pink trim and a matching cap to top off her adorable look.
body.description: Product Description Adora's PlayTime Baby Dot is a 4-piece doll set designed for ages 1 and up, featuring a 13-inch baby doll with realistic details like open-close blue eyes and a sweet baby powder scent. Weighing 12 ounces with a bean bag weighted bottom, Baby Dot feels cuddly and lifelike. The set includes a removable pink dress, matching headband, and a baby bottle for interactive play. This premium, machine washable doll encourages nurturing and imaginative play, offering both quality and value for endless hours of joy and learning. Safety-Tested, BPA-Free, and crafted with love, Baby Dot is a perfect companion for little ones. From the Manufacturer Adora Playtime babies are handmade with care and made to be loved. They are the perfect "1st" baby doll weighing just about 12 ounces. You will adore the life-like features from their little buttons noses . . . to their tiny little hands and feet. Each handmade doll is created in our exclusive, lightly baby powder scented, GentleTouch™ vinyl. Adora Playtime babies also have a cuddly silky-smooth body that reminds us of the beloved trim on a child’s favorite baby blankie! They are perfect for cuddling with a bean bag weighted bottom which gives them their life-like feel. Set Includes: • 13" Baby Powder Scented Gentle Touch™ Vinyl Baby Doll • Baby Bottle • Sleeper • Headband *Note: Baby powder fresh scent will fade over time when washed. Features: • Adora dolls are Mom tested and child approved. • Best of all they are 100% Machine Washable! • Put them in a pillowcase and them into a washing machine on gentle cycle. • Lay flat to dry • Adora Playtime baby is good as new!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Adora We believe a favorite doll should inspire adventures and spark imaginations. For over 20 years we’ve been inspiring young minds with dolls and accessories that kids love and moms approve. All of our products are thoughtfully crafted to give parents peace of mind – they’re playful, creative, durable and most of all, they’re Made for Play! Adora - PlayTime Baby Dot Perfect first Baby Doll for Little Ones to Love Make PlayTime anytime with Adora PlayTime Baby - Dot! She’s the perfect first baby doll with her adorable life-like features, soft satin-trim body and baby-powder fresh scent! Your little one won’t be able to resist snuggling with PlayTime Baby Dot’s bean weighted bottom giving her a real baby feel. She arrives dressed in a cute polka-dot sleeper with pink trim and a matching cap to top off her adorable look. Perfect for ages 1+. 'Dot' is a loveable and cuddly first baby doll at 13 inches is perfect for little ones ages 1 and up to hold and cuddle Soothing satin body, bean bag 'bottom' and life-like baby power scented vinyl She has open close eyes and can suck her thumb for realistic nurturing and play This brown eyed sweetie is Machine Washable, she can always be fresh and clean and ready for play

Machine Washable It’s your children’s most favorite toys that get the dirtiest! But don’t worry: let your little one carry their PlayTime baby toy doll everywhere they go – even through the mud! He’s machine washable, so a quick pop into the washing machine makes him good as new. Unlimited playtime fun Baby Dot is the perfect first toy doll for little ones ages 1 and up – she only weights 12 ounces and is 13”, making her the ideal size for the littlest of hands. She comes complete with an Adora baby bottle, perfect for realistic, nurturing and creative playtime. Eyes Open and Close She’s a realistic baby doll toy, thanks to his weighted bean bag 'bottom' that allows him to sit up. Additionally, she has lifelike beautiful brown eyes that open and close, a sweet, handmade face and a fresh baby powder scent. Easily Sucks Thumb Baby Dot is ready for lots of cuddles, and your little one will love their new cuddle buddy because of her super soft and silky smooth body. When they’re ready for nurturing and realistic play, this baby doll toy can even suck his thumb! Washable Perfect 1st doll Open/close eyes & Sucks it's thumb! Collect them all!

Play with Other Great Adora Products! Make PlayTime anytime with Adora Playtime Baby Flower! She’s the perfect 1st baby doll with her adorable life-like features, soft satin-trim body and baby-powder fresh scent! The perfect accessory to your favorite 15" baby dolls! Comes complete with pink polka dot beanie trimmed in velboaplushand plastic white snaps in front for easy undressing. Your little one won’t be able to resist snuggling with PlayTime Beary Blue bean weighted bottom giving him a real baby feel. Baby Time is ready for love and cuddles from all the mommies and daddies in training! BabyTime Dolls are sweetly swaddled in a newborn embroidered onesie. This baby toy doll is cuddle ready and provides plenty of realistic and nurturing play for your little one. Workout Chic is a lifelike baby doll that is 20”.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect baby doll for my 2 year old
reviews.reviewText: My daughter has become obsessed with baby dolls the past few months so after looking through Amazon this one looked super promising and I ended up getting the light up wheel stroller from the same company as well , my daughter is going to adore this baby doll and stroller when she opens them on Christmas the baby is super soft smells amazing beanbag beads in bottoms to help the baby doll sit up it’s features are very cute as well much better quality then any baby doll I’ve ever bought her and it’s supposed to be machine washable (haven’t tried yet), so excited to see her face light up on Christmas Day

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is an adorable and soft doll. My granddaughter loves her, she’s moveable and cuddly. Great for little girls. Made very well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love Adora Dolls
reviews.reviewText: I love Adora dolls…they are adorable and smell so good. It’s a plus that this one is washable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Skin color darker than pictured
reviews.reviewText: Dino Boy was the perfect size doll for a 2 year old. The skin color was darker than pictured.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great first doll (+ update 8 years later)
reviews.reviewText: This is a cute little doll. I got it for my 14-month-old, so I’m glad it’s smaller than standard dolls. It’s the perfect size for this age. I also like that this model has enough ethnic options that I was able to find one that resembles my daughter.The doll did develop a rip around the neck like in other pictures' reviews, within weeks of purchase, but I was able to sew it back up and it's been fine since. I shouldn't have to do that though, not at this price point!The only real negative about this doll is the smell. It's overpowering, nauseating, and took a really long time to fade away completely! So completely unnecessary!UPDATE: We've had this doll for EIGHT years now! First off, the smell took several YEARS to go away. To the manufacturer: please get rid of it, dolls don't need to be perfumed, it's annoying.This baby is still going strong 8 years later, and is still my daughter's favorite toy ever! She wants no other dolls, this is IT. It has been to several different countries and continents, got lost twice and I spent hours and hours of driving to go back and look for it. I am now putting an AirTag in its butt and buying a replacement baby just in case, to cover all my bases. I don't even know how it's still holding together after all this - my daughter isn't the gentlest with her toys - but it's doing great! And it hasn't had any other rips after that first one. It's a member of the family by this point, and will be a keepsake that will stay with her forever (if she doesn't lose it for good next time), to show to her grandkids some day, with pictures of its worldly adventures!P.S. I like knitting/sewing clothes for the baby. Here are some pictures of the baby at age 8 years old, rocking custom outfits around the world!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable, but has not held up
reviews.reviewText: This is an adorable baby doll. We always pay the extra money to get the adora dolls that open and close their eyes. Kids just seem to love that feature. However, we gave this to our 1 year old for Christmas, and so after only 3 1/2 weeks of use, the baby’s eye lids are noticeably chipped and the baby’s pajamas have those really unsightly and annoying clumps of fabric all over them. We haven’t even washed them yet. We have also not washed the doll since we got her, and honestly for a $40 doll, we do expect the paint not to chip (or whatever the coating is on the doll’s skin). Cheap clothing is usually the kind that gets the little balls of fabric all over it in no time. It happens to human clothes too. But not in just 3 weeks. I am most likely going to ask for a replacement to see if I just got a bad one, because I am still within the return period, and despite the flaws, my daughter absolutely loves her baby. The good thing about the adora dolls like this one is they are soft bodied, machine washable, and great for young children. We have another adora doll that had lasted much, much longer, and so I do have hope that the quality is typically better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2013
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just perfect for my 3 year old Grand daughters. (Twins)
reviews.reviewText: First of all I love buying from Amazon. Being a first time Grandma of Twin Girls and having to buy double of everything can get expensive quick. I live in a different state so how grateful I am to come on line, order from Amazon with assurance that my items will be delivered right to their door. Among the first gifts that I wanted to give them for their 3rd Birthday was a Baby Doll. I looked at a lot of dolls on the Amazon site and read many reviews. This Adora Baby Doll was the one that I kept coming back too. I ordered 2 of them and heard back from my daughter that the items arrived on time and are well made and just adorable. The twins have hours of fun with them. I also purchased a Kidkraft Tiffany Bow High Chair and doll cradles. When my daughter calls and my grand babies know it's Gamma on the phone, they run and get their dolls to show me over the phone I guess. It's time to learn to skype.I recommend these dolls to anyone and I'm going to have to buy 2 more of these for my home when they should come to visit me and happen to leave their baby dolls home. Their even cute enough to put in my spare bedroom that I'll need to turn into a girls room. This won't be my last time purchasing these dolls. I am very pleased with my decision to read many reviews from different manufactures and choose these precious baby dolls. My grand daughters absolutely love their dolls.My daughter has told me how cute these carriers are and they are well made and just adorable. She is very pleased so this exceeds all of my expectations. Just looking at them on line makes even a Grandma want one for when the grand children come to visit. They are just so cute and it brings back memories of my sister and I playing house with our dolls and carriers back in the day we were young. I would highly recommend these.

reviews.reviewText: I was in love with my doll! It smells so good!! These are the best babies for small toddlers!!
This is a very cute baby doll. A little over priced, but cute, cuddly and soft. It is pretty small, but it's meant for a toddler to carry around like a little baby.
Thank you for the sweet Dora dolly. Adora dolla smell like a new baby. Perfect gift for little girls!

reviews.reviewTitle: Lovely doll with a nice smell
reviews.reviewText: Love the doll as it smells so nice and great for pretend play.
This doll is so sweet and the smell will transport you to your childhood. My daughter loves it and the size is perfect
